name: Exo Space
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.

Modifications:

  1. Created 3 complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  2. Modified the out-of-game menus: created new buttons, backdrops and game logo in PhotoShop and created animation for the logo.
  3. Changed the player and all enemys to completely different characters and made animation for each character.
  4. Added custom music to my game. I created 4 different melodies (menu theme and melody for each level) in FL studio.
  5.  Modified the in-game GUI.

Credits:

Created by Yaroslav Musiychuk
